snippet.title: Monobot - Official Game Launch Trailer (2021)
snippet.description:
Purchase now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1212850?utm_source=youtube

Monobot is a 2D physics-based puzzle platformer where you take control of Mono, a small entity caught up in a hostile world set in a dark, distant future. Coming online, Mono finds himself alone and without answers. Players must guide Mono through his solo journey, unravelling puzzles to uncover the buried secrets of this dystopian world. Can you break the infinite cycle and find your true self?

Features
- Gravity confines the jump height, the height jumping can reach is relative to the gravity of the current space.
- Two arm skills bring about unique gameplay experiences, mix and match to overcome the obstacles.
- Solve the puzzles through action, fine-tuned physics brings lively performances.
- Collect the documents and discover the history of a grand story universe.
- Futuristic and atmospheric world presented by concise art style.
